## Subscription.prices property

Array of product ID and price ID pairs. If multiple recurring prices were provided to the checkout session (e.g. via `lineItems`<!-- -->) this array holds all recurring prices for this subscription. The first element of this array always corresponds to the [Subscription.price](./firestore-stripe-payments.subscription.price.md) and [Subscription.product](./firestore-stripe-payments.subscription.product.md) fields on the subscription.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly prices: Array<{
        product: string;
        price: string;
    }>;
```
